verbs.description: [ARG0: The LGBTQ movement] [V: tries] [ARG1: to paint itself as the reasonable side of the discussion] , but its confused , pugnacious arguments often manifest the opposite . On June 6th , The Daily Beast published an article by legal affairs columnist Jay Michaelson with the headline , “ If Trump Wo n’t Proclaim Pride Month , Let ’s Proclaim LGBT Rage Month Instead . ”
